00036 struct _WindowData {
00037     void                *data;
00038     WindowDataHandler   handler;

00041 WindowData *windowdata_new(void *data, WindowDataHandler handler) {
00042     WindowData *wb= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*wb), "windowdata_new");
00043     wb->data= data;
00044     wb->handler= handler;
00045     
00046     return wb;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void windowdata_handle(WindowData *wb, GHOST_EventHandle evt) {
00050     wb->handler(wb->data, evt);
00051 }

00053 void windowdata_free(WindowData *wb) {
00054     MEM_freeN(wb);
